[Output Status Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494122-output-status-constants)Status values returned from the [`AudioCodecProduceOutputPackets(_:_:_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiocodecproduceoutputpackets(_:_:_:_:_:_:)) function.[Program Target Levels](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494116-program-target-levels)[Dynamic Range Control Modes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494094-dynamic-range-control-modes)[Bit Rate Control Mode Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494144-bit-rate-control-mode-constants)Bit rate control modes to be used with `kAudioCodecPropertyBitRateControlMode`.[Global Codec Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494121-global-codec-properties)These read-only properties disclose the capabilities of the codec and remain the same for all instances of the codec.[Instance Codec Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494111-instance-codec-properties)Properties that can be set or read on an instance of the audio codec.[Audio Codec Priming Method Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494154-audio-codec-priming-method-const)Values used with `kAudioCodecPropertyPrimeMethod`.[Audio Codec Quality Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494130-audio-codec-quality-constants)Sound quality settings to be used with the property `kAudioCodecPropertyQualitySetting`.[Audio Codec Routine Selectors](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494074-audio-codec-routine-selectors)Selectors used by the Component Manager to call routines implemented by the codec and exposed to developers through the Audio Codec Services API. These selectors are for use by codec developers; if you are calling Audio Codec Services functions, you donâ€™t need to use these constants.[Audio Codec Delays](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494127-audio-codec-delays)[Audio Codec Delay Modes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494050-audio-codec-delay-modes)[Audio Codec Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1494068-audio-codec-properties)
